amendment.description: Amendment requires the Secretary of the Army to make an annual report to Congress on whether lock and dam construction and ecosystem restoration projects contained in title 8, concerning the Upper Mississippi River and Illinois Waterway System, are being carried out at comparable rates; and clarifies the role of Congress to ensure that the projects have a comparable rate of progress.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 109-160 to add a new provision requiring the Secretary to make an annual report to Congress on whether the lock and dam construction and ecosystem restoration projects are being carried out at comparable rates.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kind amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
